mapper.select: select o.id, o.order_at as orderTime, o.status, (select count(*) from order_item oi where oi.order_id=o.id) as count, (select name from product where id=(select product_id from order_item oi where oi.order_id=o.id and rownum=1)) as name from orders o where username=#{username}
select address, case when status='COMPLETE' then null else order_at end as order_at, delivery_at, status, order_total_price from orders
